name: Dream Crawler
description:
Dream Crawler is a game where you control a boy and his teddy bear-shooting cannon and guide him through his nightmares (consisting of spider-related fears) in an attempt to defeat them.

This is the first full game that I've created in Unity after playing around with the engine for about a month.
I made this game on the side in about a week as a challenge, so it's not long or very polished - sort of like my own little personal game jam. 
Originally, the game was going to contain more nightmare-related levels, but I was rather busy the entire week so I ran out of the time I set for myself.

If you're interested in more of my projects, you can check out my website.
